post_title: FS: SGC 3 Bresnahan w/bat Polar Bear back ***SOLD***
post_content:
Centered, good color and a super clean and bold polar bear back. $225 net to me delivered. Sold here or via PM trumps all offers or negotiations. Thanks. 

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/52239569565_fa322582b5_c_d.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/52239089528_2a7bee9832_c_d.jpg[/IMG][IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/52238098127_afb43398de_c_d.jpg[/IMG]
Sorry someone beat you by 2 minutes via PM.
Nice grab whoever got this….. I’m always late.
